Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to environmental purchasing and the establishment of a director of citywide environmental purchasing.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an office of environmental purchasing.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the purchase of energy efficient products, and to repeal subdivisions a, c, d, e and f of section 6-127 of such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reduction of hazardous substances in products purchased by the city.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reduction of hazardous substances in products used by the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the purchase of products with recycled content, and to repeal section 6-122 and subchapter 5 of chapter 3 of title 16 of such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Use of products with recycled content.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the use of green power.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the purchase of green cleaning and other custodial products.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Use of less toxic cleaning and other custodial products.
